+++ General
This page only relates to preview, not to the editor. The find dialog is not persé a wikidpad facility but one of the preview renderer used; íf it has one. This find facility is therefore renderer dependent.
	* Internal previewer: no find function
	* IE previewer: IE find dialog
	* Mozilla/Gecko: Unknown [1]

To start the find dialog:
	* press Ctrl-F in preview

[:rel:top]
[1] _Could not be checked because of a severe bug in the python/mozilla area._

+++ IE find dialog
